dublinCore.dc:title: 113 HR 5030 EH: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 13500 SW 250 Street in Princeton, Florida, as the “Corporal Christian A. Guzman Rivera Post Office Building”.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.official-title: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 13500 SW 250 Street in Princeton, Florida, as the Corporal Christian A. Guzman Rivera Post Office Building.

section.header: Corporal Christian A. Guzman Rivera Post Office Building

subsection.text: The facility of the United States Postal Service located at 13500 SW 250 Street in Princeton, Florida, shall be known and designated as the Corporal Christian A. Guzman Rivera Post Office Building.

Any references in a law, map, regulation, document, paper, or other record of the United States to the facility referred to in subsection (a) shall be deemed to be a reference to the Corporal Christian A. Guzman Rivera Post Office Building.

attestation-group.attestation-date: Passed the House of Representatives September 8, 2014.
